title: BRIEF-Range Resources Signs Agreement For Sale Of Range Resources Trinidad To LandOcean
text:
BRIEF-Range Resources Signs Agreement For Sale Of Range Resources Trinidad To LandOcean

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 03, 2019 09:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Range Resources Signs Agreement For Sale Of Range Resources Trinidad To LandOcean Sept 3 (Reuters) - Range Resources (NYSE: ) Ltd : * CO SIGNED A BINDING CONDITIONAL SALE AND PURCHASE AGREEMENT FOR SALE OF RANGE RESOURCES TRINIDAD LIMITED TO LANDOCEAN * DEAL FOR A CASH CONSIDERATION OF US$2.5 MILLION * SALE OF RRTL IN EXCHANGE FOR OFFSETTING ALL OUTSTANDING DEBT DUE FROM RANGE TO LANDOCEAN

BRIEF-Range Resources Signs Agreement For Sale Of Range Resources Trinidad To LandOcean
